data.installation#Installation:
Before installing this package, make sure you have installed Panda
CSS in your
project.
data.step-1#Step 1:
Install the package


npm i -D @shadow-panda/preset



pnpm add -D @shadow-panda/preset



yarn add --dev @shadow-panda/preset



This package is not published yet (WIP)

data.install-the-following-dependencies#Insta:
npm i @radix-ui/react-slot



pnpm add @radix-ui/react-slot



yarn add @radix-ui/react-slot
data.usage#Usage:
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'

<Button variant="default" size="default">
Button
</Button>
data.link#Link:
You can use the button recipe to create a link that looks like a button.
import { button } from '<generated>/styled-system/recipes'

<Link className={button({ variant: 'outline' })}>Click here</Link>
Alternatively, you can set the asChild parameter and nest the link component.
<Button asChild>
<Link href="/login">Login</Link>
</Button>

data: Panda CSS preset for shadcn/ui & Radix UI
